metadata.title: CVE-2018-16418 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A buffer overflow when handling string concatenation in util_acl_to_str intools/util.c in OpenSC before 0.19.0-rc1 could be used by attackers able tosupply crafted smartcards to cause a denial of service (application crash)or possibly have unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16418` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.19.0-1build1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.19.0-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opensc package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.0-1build1').
